title: Production-ready canonical public URL and launch metadata alignment

requirements.summary: Document and standardize production configuration for the canonical public URL via VITE_PUBLIC_URL, matching the default in publicUrl.ts.
acceptanceCriteria: A production build can be configured with VITE_PUBLIC_URL=https://bubbas.big.adventure.com without code changes.
Documentation in the repo clearly states how to set VITE_PUBLIC_URL for production deployments.

file_operations.description: Expand the documentation to explicitly describe how production deployments must set VITE_PUBLIC_URL=https://bubbas.big.adventure.com (including where to set environment variables in common deployment scenarios), and clarify that frontend/src/config/publicUrl.ts is the single source of truth used by the app.

Add an example production environment file demonstrating the required VITE_PUBLIC_URL=https://bubbas.big.adventure.com value to make production configuration copy/pasteable and reduce misconfiguration risk.

requirements.summary: Keep canonical/OG/Twitter URL metadata aligned to https://bubbas.big.adventure.com and prevent conflicting hard-coded public URLs.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html contains canonical/OG/Twitter URL metadata pointing to https://bubbas.big.adventure.com.
No other hard-coded public URL values conflict with https://bubbas.big.adventure.com.

file_operations.description: Verify canonical link, og:url, and twitter:url are set to https://bubbas.big.adventure.com and update/normalize them if needed so production sharing previews resolve to the correct domain.

Tighten inline documentation to explicitly state that VITE_PUBLIC_URL is the required production override and that the default fallback must remain https://bubbas.big.adventure.com to match the canonical domain.

requirements.summary: Ensure the footer Facebook social link opens the exact share URL in a new tab with proper external-link security attributes.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the Facebook icon in the footer navigates to https://www.facebook.com/share/1AndNU7trz/?mibextid=wwXIfr in a new tab.
The link includes rel="noopener noreferrer" for external navigation security.

file_operations.description: Confirm the Facebook anchor href is exactly https://www.facebook.com/share/1AndNU7trz/?mibextid=wwXIfr, uses target="_blank", and includes rel="noopener noreferrer"; refactor to a file-level constant to reduce accidental drift without changing behavior.
